_header: Take heed unto my figure here above
_description: A warning of death — eight lines

BLAdd37049.First Lines:
Take hede unto my fygure here abowneAnd se how sumtyme I was
                    fresche and gay…
BLAdd37049.Note:
Accompanies a picture of Death as a putrefying lady dressed in fine
                    clothes, introducing 2625.
